_Comment: remove the _ before a non-comment tag to enable it

apworld_description: Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

web._Comment: theres a lot more you can do in the web section.

tutorials.name: Multiworld Setup Guide
tutorials.description: A guide to setting up manual game integration for Archipelago multiworld games.
tutorials._comment: if you dont include the authors it will use creator from game.json
